DataElement.preferredName: Biospecimen Tissue Case Summary Problem Documented Date
DataElement.preferredDefinition: The date that a problem with the tissue was documented.

DataElementConcept.preferredName: Biospecimen Tissue Case Summary Problem Documented
DataElementConcept.preferredDefinition: Any material sample taken from a biological entity for testing, diagnostic, propagation, treatment or research purposes, including a sample obtained from a living organism or taken from the biological object after halting of all its life functions. Biospecimen can contain one or more components including but not limited to cellular molecules, cells, tissues, organs, body fluids, embryos, and body excretory products._An anatomical structure consisting of similarly specialized cells and intercellular matrix, aggregated according to genetically determined spatial relationships, performing a specific function._A problem requiring investigation._A shortened version of a speech or written text, containing only the main points._A difficulty, disorder, or condition needing resolution._Furnished with or supported by documents and documentation.

ObjectClass.preferredDefinition: Any material sample taken from a biological entity for testing, diagnostic, propagation, treatment or research purposes, including a sample obtained from a living organism or taken from the biological object after halting of all its life functions. Biospecimen can contain one or more components including but not limited to cellular molecules, cells, tissues, organs, body fluids, embryos, and body excretory products.

Concepts.definition: Any material sample taken from a biological entity for testing, diagnostic, propagation, treatment or research purposes, including a sample obtained from a living organism or taken from the biological object after halting of all its life functions. Biospecimen can contain one or more components including but not limited to cellular molecules, cells, tissues, organs, body fluids, embryos, and body excretory products.

A difficulty, disorder, or condition needing resolution.

Concepts.definition: The particular day, month and year an event has happened or will happen.
